meanings.definition: Any of a group of naturally occurring unsaturated solid alcohols, such as cholesterol, that are precursors to steroid hormones.
meanings.sent1: Cholesterol is a type of sterol that helps make hormones.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes check your sterol levels to monitor your health.
meanings.sent3: The sterol family tree: Cholesterol, the wise elder, guiding the young hormones.
meanings.sent4: In the body's orchestra, sterol plays the crucial role of hormone conductor.
meanings.sent5: Picture sterol as the building blocks for the body's hormonal masterpiece.
